page.title: 01Summary Of The Area
page.content: The western areas Netherton, Bulcliff and West Bretton CP are all rural. There are two main woods Bulcliff North and Bulcliff. The main road running from South_West to North_East is the A636 known as Denby Dale Road. the Eastern areas,Crigglestone CP, Great Cliff, Dennington, Wooley Low Moor, Painthorpe, Hall Green and Hollingthorpe are more densely populated. The M1 Motorway runs through the Area from South to North. Three First Schools and a Middle School are in the Areas. A Railway runs from the South to North skirting Crigglestone. It is Part of a network of local lines linking Sheffield via Wakefield to Leeds. Wakefield is 3 miles to the East of the Area.
